All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackCancelPayButtonEvents
This class provides event handlers for the back, cancel and pay buttons in the main window of a restaurant ordering system.
Burger
This is a class named "Burger" that defines a burger's attributes such as name, price and content.
BurgerEnum
BurgerEnum that represents various types of burgers, each with a name, price, content and image path.
CancelPayButtonEvents
This is a class that defines the event handlers for the cancel and pay buttons in the point of sale system.
CentralPanel
The CentralPanel class represents the central panel of the ordering application.
Database
A class that handles the communication between the application and the database.
Drink
This is a class named "Drink" that defines a drink's attributes such as name and price.
DrinkEnum
DrinkEnum that represents various types of drinks, each with a name, price, and image path.
EndWindow
This is the EndWindow class which is responsible for displaying a "thank you" message on a new screen after the user has completed their order.
FoodEnum
FoodEnum that represents various types of food (burgers, pizzas, hotdogs), each with a name, price, content and image path.
FoodInterface
This is an interface named FoodInterface that declares a single method isGlutenfree() without any implementation details.
FoodTest
This class is used to test the functionality of the different food classes, including Burger, Pizza, Hotdog and Drink.
FxMain
This is the main class that launches the JavaFX application.
Hotdog
This is a class named "Hotdog" that defines a hotdog's attributes such as name, price and content.
HotdogEnum
HotdogEnum that represents various types of hotdogs, each with a name, price, content and image path.
MainWindow
This class represents the main window of the application.
MenuButtonEvents
This class represents the event handlers for the buttons in the main menu of the application.
Order
Class representing an order made by the customer, consisting of a key, quantity, meal and price.
PayWindow
PayWindow class is responsible for creating and displaying the pay window on the main window.
Pizza
This is a class named "Pizza" that defines a pizza's attributes such as name, price and content.
PizzaEnum
PizzaEnum that represents various types of pizzas, each with a name, price, content and image path.
ProductButtonEvents
This class handles the event listeners for the buttons and text fields in the product window.
ProductWindow
The ProductWindow class is responsible for creating a new window that shows the product's details when a user clicks on the product in the main window.
RandomFavouriteNumbers
This class generates a list of random integers representing the indexes of the user's favourite food items.
RestaurantApp
The main class of the RestaurantApp application that launches the program by creating a new MainWindow object and calling its start() method.
Timer
A class representing a timer used to count down a specified number of seconds.
